/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below. Buildings and trees line the sides of the road, adding depth and context to the scene. Cars and buses are scattered along the road, indicating a busy time of day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of scale to the scene. The colors in the image are bright and vibrant, reflecting the lively atmosphere of the city.
